kv2.10:1.3: Lokuttare sote paṭihaññati no lokiye, lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no lokiyena, sāvakā paṭivijānanti no puthujjanāti?
kv2.10:2.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti?
kv2.10:2.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:3.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:3.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:4.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ puthujjanā paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:4.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:5.3: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṁ, satipaṭṭhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ iddhipādo indriyaṁ balaṁ bojjhaṅgoti?
kv2.10:6.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇantīti?
kv2.10:6.5: Lokuttaro dhammo sotaviññeyyo, sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
kv2.10:7.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
kv2.10:7.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:8.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre rajjeyyunti?
kv2.10:8.5: Lokuttaro dhammo rāgaṭṭhāniyo rajanīyo kamanīyo madanīyo bandhanīyo mucchanīyoti?
kv2.10:9.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyoti?
kv2.10:9.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:10.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre dusseyyunti?
kv2.10:11.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyoti?
kv2.10:11.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:12.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre muyheyyunti?
kv2.10:12.5: Lokuttaro dhammo mohaṭṭhāniyo aññāṇakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattanikoti?
kv2.10:13.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattanikoti?
kv2.10:13.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:14.3: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:15.1: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:15.3: Bālaputhujjanā buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, bālaputhujjanā maggaṁ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:15.9: saṅghabhedako buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇāti, saṅghabhedako maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
kv2.10:16.1: Labbhā sovaṇṇamayāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
kv2.10:16.3: Evamevaṁ bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti.
kv2.10:17.1: Labbhā elaṇḍiyāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
kv2.10:17.3: Evamevaṁ bhagavā lokiyena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti.
kv2.10:18.1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
kv2.10:18.3: Lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiye sote paṭihaññati, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttare sote paṭihaññati;
kv2.10:18.4: lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti;
kv2.10:18.5: lokiyaṁ voharantassa puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa sāvakā paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:19.2: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti?
kv2.10:19.4: Nanu bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti?
kv2.10:19.6: Hañci bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:19.7: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti.
kv2.10:20.1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
kv2.10:20.3: Maggaṁ voharantassa maggo hoti, amaggaṁ voharantassa amaggo hoti, phalaṁ voharantassa phalaṁ hoti, aphalaṁ voharantassa aphalaṁ hoti, nibbānaṁ voharantassa nibbānaṁ hoti, anibbānaṁ voharantassa anibbānaṁ hoti, saṅkhataṁ voharantassa saṅkhataṁ hoti, asaṅkhataṁ voharantassa asaṅkhataṁ hoti, rūpaṁ voharantassa rūpaṁ hoti, arūpaṁ voharantassa arūpaṁ hoti, vedanaṁ voharantassa vedanā hoti, avedanaṁ voharantassa avedanā hoti, saññaṁ voharantassa saññā hoti, asaññaṁ voharantassa asaññā hoti, saṅkhāre voharantassa saṅkhārā honti, asaṅkhāre voharantassa asaṅkhārā honti, viññāṇaṁ voharantassa viññāṇaṁ hoti, aviññāṇaṁ voharantassa aviññāṇaṁ hotīti?
